ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: BOM UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS BoM_M2U
BOM UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS BoMElem_M2U
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.bom_id = 'BA' + '_' + PARENT_ID + '_' + BOM_ID + '_' + LOCATION_ID + CASE WHEN ALT_GROUP IS NOT NULL THEN '_' + ALT_GROUP ELSE '' END

ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: CAPPATTERNELEM UDAs associated to UDS CapPatternElem
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.cap_pattern_id = m.CAP_PATTERN_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND u.idx = m.IDX

ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: CUSTOMER UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS CUSTOMER
DEMAND UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS DEMANDS
DEMANDELEM UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS DemandElem
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.demand_id = m.DEMAND_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND u.elem_ix = m.ELEM_IX

ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: DEMAND UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS DEMANDS
Location UDAs associated to UDS Location
Method UDAs associated to UDS Method
Method UDAs associated to UDS Method
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.method_type = 'MethodMake' AND u.route_id = m.route_id COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND u.location_id = m.LOCATION_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND

ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: Method UDAs associated to UDS Method
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.method_type = 'MethodMove' AND u.id = 'T_' + PRODUCT_ID + 'SEP' + TO_LOCATION + '_' + FROM_LOCATION + CASE TRANSPORTATION_MODE WHEN NULL THEN '' ELSE '_' + TRANSPORTATION_MODE END

ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: Operation UDAs associated to UDS Operation
PRODUCT - location UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS inventory
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.commodity = m.PROD_SKU_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND u.location = m.LOCATION_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT

ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: Commodit UDAs
Product Substitute UDA on Method
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.method_type = 'MethodMake' AND u.id = 'M_' + m.PRODUCT_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT + '_SUB_' + m.SUB_PROD_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT + '_' + m.LOCATION_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT + '_' +

ATT_USER_CLASS_DESC: RESOURCE UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS RESOURCE
SetupMatRelation UDAs associated to UDS SetupMatRelation
SUPPLY UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS SUPPLY
Vendor UDAs associated to UDS Vendor
WORKORDER UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS WORKORDERS - BOTH WIP AND GRAYBOX_WIP
WIP UDAS ASSOCIATED TO UDS WipStepLots
UPDATE_CONDITION: u.lot_id = m.LOT_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND u.sequence_id=m.STEP_SEQUENCE_ID COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT
